title: Project-Based Curriculum for Designing Virtual Social Learning Worlds

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and foundational knowledge in social studies
context.additional_context: Focuses on designing and implementing virtual social scenarios that reflect the characteristics of working professionals (administrative/managerial roles) and resemble real work environments. Conducts collaborative learning using personal devices (tablets/laptops) in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can implement social problem-solving scenarios using virtual space design tools (e.g., Minecraft Education, CoSpaces).
Learners can design and evaluate educational content (quests, role distribution, interactive elements) in virtual worlds through PBL team activities.
Learners can critically analyze technical/educational challenges in building virtual learning worlds and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
